DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetic profile ropinirole PR single multiple dos PR-formulation . It also investigate safety tolerability ropinirole PR single multiple dos PR-formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Ropinirole PR Pharmacokinetics Study Among Chinese Healthy Subjects
